Title: Tense moments as aircraft seeks emergency landing
Content: The domestic terminal of the airport here witnessed tense moments on Wednesday when the pilot of an IndiGo flight, carrying over 160 passengers, from Mumbai made a request for emergency landing owing
Author: Staff Reporter
